description: You can ask Alexa to control several of the sensor mirror proâ€™s features such as mirror brightness, lighting presets, changing color temperature or setting a timer. To get started, you must have a sensor mirror pro and a simplehuman app account.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask sensor mirror to brighten
Alexa, ask sensor mirror to use the office setting
Alexa, ask sensor mirror to set the timer to 5 minutes
name: simplehuman sensor mirror pro
shortDescription:
To use the sensor mirror pro skill, try saying: 
Alexa, ask sensor mirror to set brightness to 50 percent.
